mutants.code:
def calculate_kits_distribution(n, kits):
    home_kits = [kit[0] for kit in kits]
    away_kits = [kit[1] for kit in kits]
    result = []
    for i in range(n):
        home_games = n - 1
        away_games = n - 1
        clashes = home_kits.count(away_kits[i])
        home_games -= clashes
        away_games -= clashes
        result.append((home_games, away_games))
    return result

    for i in range(n):
        home_games = n - 1
        away_games = n - 1
        clashes = home_kits.count(away_kits[i])
        home_games += clashes
        away_games += clashes
        result.append((home_games, away_games))
    return result

def calculate_kits_distribution(n, kits):
    home_kits = [kit[0] for kit in kits]
    away_kits = [kit[1] for kit in kits]
    result = []
    for i in range(n):
        home_games = n + 1
        away_games = n - 1
        clashes = home_kits.count(away_kits[i])
        home_games += clashes
        away_games -= clashes
        result.append((home_games, away_games))
    return result

    home_kits = [kit[0] for kit in kits]
